mapper.update: update subtask set dividedId = #{dividedId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, inputName = #{inputName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, itemName1 = #{itemName1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, itemName2 = #{itemName2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, score1 = #{score1,jdbcType=FLOAT}, score2 = #{score2,jdbcType=FLOAT}, randomNum = #{randomNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, frequency = #{frequency,jdbcType=INTEGER}, inputDes = #{inputDes,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, itemDes1 = #{itemDes1,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, itemDes2 = #{itemDes2,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where subtaskId = #{subtaskId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select subtaskId, dividedId, inputName, itemName1, itemName2, score1, score2, randomNum, frequency, inputDes, itemDes1, itemDes2 from subtask where subtaskId = #{subtaskId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select subtaskId, dividedId, inputName, itemName1, itemName2, score1, score2, randomNum, frequency, inputDes, itemDes1, itemDes2 from subtask
